content.prompt: From the words <u>ne valeam</u> . . . <u>meis</u> (lines 3-4), we learn that Martial

choices.label: would rather die than grant the woman’s request
claims to have used too much paper for his poetry
thank the woman for pointing out an error in his poem

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
